### Upload local repo to remote

1. create the local repo (or already exist)
2. create an empty remote repo
3. push the local to remote



## Command line in terminal
cd
come to directory

pwd
print working directory

open 
open certain directory

ls
list all folders and files

clear
clear all things in the terminal

.
current directory path

..
main directory path

tab
automatically fill-out
